mapper.insert: insert into patent_detail (patent_id, `name`, apply_name, `type`, apply_date, pub_notice_num, auth_notice_num, legal_status, case_status, auth_notice_date, main_category_num, `status`, create_time, update_time) values (#{patentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pubNoticeNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authNoticeNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authNoticeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainCategoryNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update patent_detail set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_name = #{applyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_date = #{applyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pub_notice_num = #{pubNoticeNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auth_notice_num = #{authNoticeNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, legal_status = #{legalStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, case_status = #{caseStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auth_notice_date = #{authNoticeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, main_category_num = #{mainCategoryNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where patent_id = #{patentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select patent_id, `name`, apply_name, `type`, apply_date, pub_notice_num, auth_notice_num, legal_status, case_status, auth_notice_date, main_category_num, `status`, create_time, update_time from patent_detail where patent_id = #{patentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select patent_id, `name`, apply_name, `type`, apply_date, pub_notice_num, auth_notice_num, legal_status, case_status, auth_notice_date, main_category_num, `status`, create_time, update_time from patent_detail

select patent_id, `name`, apply_name, `type`, apply_date, pub_notice_num, auth_notice_num, legal_status, case_status, auth_notice_date, main_category_num, `status`, create_time, update_time from patent_detail where status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}
